articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Why has Trump given white South Africans refugee status? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: Trump stirs controversy by calling Afrikaners, a minority group descended from Dutch colonists, victims of a ‘genocide’
articles.content: On Monday, 59 white South Africans arrived in the United States as part of a refugee programme set up by President Donald Trump to offer sanctuary from what Washington has described as racial discrim… [+6917 chars]
